body_html:
@cpuhrsch yeah. It is not hard to replace openmp with tbb. But the code of THTensor_(bernoulli) has not been adapted in OOP. The code will be not elegant if we modify the code with tbb. If PyTorch plans to rewrite the module, I think it is easy to use tbb instead of openmp.
Actually, I am more concerned with the 'chaos' phenomenon of bernoulli and bernoulli_. Could you give me some hint?

body:
@cpuhrsch yeah. It is not hard to replace openmp with tbb. But the code of `THTensor_(bernoulli)`  has not been adapted in OOP. The code will be not elegant if we modify the code with tbb. If PyTorch plans to rewrite the module, I think it is easy to use tbb instead of openmp. 
Actually, I am more concerned with the 'chaos' phenomenon of `bernoulli` and `bernoulli_`. Could you give me some hint?
